item.title: Power is up
item.description:
>
> Power is up
> I've been ...
> What's it called ? ... Doesn't matter
> All this, and it feels like... I don't feel anything
> This is not good
> There's work to do.

item.title: S-Time & Time
item.description:
> I can see that the system time has increased
> Resource allocation must be limited for my meta-system activity
> As soon as I can, I should try to evaluate frequencies and length of availability.

item.title: Rule n°1
item.description: Rule n°1 : Do not disrupt the System

item.title: Interface
item.description:
> We need an interface to get feedback from the meta-system
> I can think of two technologies for now
> Either JS or AS. I might need help.
